summary: The package implements the core infrastructure for Metaflow's card system, including discovery and registration of external card modules, base abstractions for cards, a suite of reusable UI components (text, markdown, tables, images, visualizations, error handling, etc.), rendering utilities, type conversion helpers, and mock implementations for testing.
business_intent: To provide a flexible, extensible framework that lets Metaflow users build, render, and manage rich interactive cards within workflow runs, supporting custom extensions and reliable testing of card functionality.
